title: "Schools Let AI Spy on Kids Who May Be Considering Suicide. But at What Cost?"
excerpt: "Through a careful review of the existing evidence, and through interviews with dozens of school staff, parents, and others, we found that AI based monitoring, far from being a solution to the persistent and growing problem of youth suicide, might well give rise to more problems than what it seeks to solve."
